Terminate on Sight is the second studio album from the rap group G-Unit. The title of the album was originally announced to be Shoot to Kill and then Lock & Load, with the eventual name being Terminate on Sight. The album was originally scheduled to be released on June 24, 2008, which, at the time, was the same day as former G-Unit member The Game&#039;s album L.A.X.. The date was then changed by Interscope Records to July 1.

Producers: Dr. Dre, Eminem, Ron Browz, Rick Rock, Street Radio, Swizz Beatz, Tha Bizness, Jake One, Ky Miller, Dual Output, Damien Taylor, Don Cannon, Ty Fyffe & Dangerous LLC.
